definition: Spherical harmonic model of the magnetic signature of oceanic M2 tide
description: This product contains the representation of a model of the magnetic field of the Lunar M<sub>2</sub> ocean tides using spherical harmonic coefficients. The model is estimated from Swarm and ground observatory data using the Comprehensive Inversion scheme within the Swarm Level 2 Processing system.
related_resources:
Part of the CI (comprehensive inversion) chain, related to the "CM" model series, see e.g.:

Sabaka, T.J., Tøffner-Clausen, L., Olsen, N. et al. CM6: a comprehensive geomagnetic field model derived from both CHAMP and Swarm satellite observations. Earth Planets Space 72, 80 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1186/s40623-020-01210-5
